verbs.description: President Trump [V: is] doubling down on his charge Germany faces a rise in crime as its immigrant population has increased - a move that comes as he faces his own immigration crisis .

[ARG0: President Trump] is [V: doubling] down [ARG1: on his charge Germany faces a rise in crime as its immigrant population has increased] - [ARGM-ADV: a move that comes as he faces his own immigration crisis] .
